fmod.command.options.entdeathmsg: Set Show Entity Death Messages to %s.
fmod.command.options.gptkey: Set GPT API Access Tokens to %s.
fmod.command.options.gptmodel: Set GPT API Language Model to %s.
fmod.command.options.largetemperature: GPT Temperature cannot be greater than 1: %s.
fmod.command.options.bcbossdeath: Set Show Boss Death Messages to %s.
fmod.command.options.nameddeath: Set Show Named Entity Death Messages to %s.
fmod.command.options.bossmaxhp: Set Boss Max Health Threshold to %s.
fmod.command.options.negativemaxhp: Boss Max Health Threshold cannot be negative: %s.
fmod.command.options.bckillerdeath: Set Show Killer Death Messages to %s.
fmod.options.title: F Minecraft Mod Options
fmod.options.hint.translate:
If enabled, the server will translate all the messages and then send to the client.
This is useful if only the server has this mod installed and the client does not have it.
But if enabled, the message will not follow the client's language setting.
This option will not working on the client side.
Default: false
fmod.options.hint.entdeathmsg:
If enabled, the server will send an actionbar message to the client when an entity dies.
Default: false
fmod.options.hint.gpturl:
The URL of the target GPT server when executing command /f gpt.
This mod will use the OpenAI API. So if you want to deploy a local LLM, you must make sure it is compatible with the OpenAI API.
Default: "http://127.0.0.1:12345/v1/chat/completions"
fmod.options.hint.gptkey:
The access tokens of the GPT server.
If the sever does not need an access token, leave it blank.
Default: ""
fmod.options.gptkey.noedit: For security reasons, you cannot edit the access tokens here. If you need to change it, please use the command /f options gptAccessTokens or directly modify the configuration file.
fmod.options.hint.gptmodel:
The language model of the target GPT server when executing command /f gpt.
If the sever does not need to choose a model, leave it blank.
Default: ""
fmod.options.hint.gpttemperature:
The temperature parameter of GPT.
Default: 0.8
fmod.options.hint.gpttimeout:
The timeout of the GPT network request.
Unit: seconds
Default: 60
fmod.options.hint.bcbossdeath:
If enabled, the server will send a chat message to the client when a boss dies.
Default: false
fmod.options.hint.nameddeath:
If enabled, the server will send a chat message to the client when a entity with custom name dies.
Default: false
fmod.options.hint.bossmaxhp:
If an entity's max health is greater than this value, it will be recognized as a boss.
Default: 150
fmod.options.hint.bckillerdeath:
If enabled, the server will send a chat message to the client when a killer dies.
If an entity has killed a player before, it will be recognized as a killer.
Default: false
fmod.options.hint.bcdeathcoord:
If enabled, the server will send the Coordinates of the death location to the client when a player dies.
Default: false
fmod.misc.version: Minecraft %s, F Minecraft Mod version %s, Copyright %s.
